ComicInfo.Summary: The End of the Ghost Rider!: Johnny Blaze is trapped in a soul gem and Zarathos takes over his body to fight the nefarious Centurious. During the battle, Zarathos and Centurious are trapped in the gem and Johnny Blaze is wholly human once again and faces a hopeful future.
